title: Meryl Streep got kicked out of the main project to lie to Trump?
subtitle: A false newspaper article published on several unreliable websites alleged that actress Merrill Streep had been expelled from a major television project for lying about Donald Trump.
author: David Emery
vclaim: Meryl Streep was fired by Director Ron Howard from a "Happy Days" reboot to lie about Donald Trump making fun of a disabled reporter.
